recipesJson.name: Kool Waterberry-Malone
recipesJson.author: robolto78
recipesJson.description: Credit to @enyawreklaw. This is a recipe I created for my wife and it was possible because of the incredible one shot concentrate that is Water-Malone by DIYorDie. It is as it looks. A cool watermelon strawberry profile. She vapes it in the Uwell Nunchaku and she loves it. I occasionally mix up a batch for myself and omit the koolada. This is a SNV.
